title: 5 Simple Ways to Uninstall Roblox and Roblox Studio

steps.title: Close Roblox completely.
steps.content: Close Roblox completely. To check if it's running in the background, press Command + Option + Esc to open the Force Quit window. If you see Roblox still running, select it and click Force Quit . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Finder.
steps.content: Open the Finder. This looks like a blue and grey face icon. You can find it on the Dock. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click Applications.
steps.content: Click Applications . This will be on the left panel, underneath AirDrop . You'll see a list of all your applications.

steps.title: Right-click or ^ Control Roblox.
steps.content: Right-click or ^ Control Roblox . The applications will be organized in alphabetical order. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Click Move to Trash/Bin.
steps.content: Click Move to Trash/Bin . You can also drag the Roblox icon into the trash can on the Dock. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Empty the Trash/Bin.
steps.content: Empty the Trash/Bin. Click and hold the trash can icon in the Dock, then click Empty Trash/Bin . If you want to delete Roblox without emptying your entire trash, click the trash icon. Control-click Roblox → Delete Immediately → Delete . [4] X Research source

steps.title: Close Roblox completely.
steps.content: Close Roblox completely. To check if it's running in the background, right-click the Start menu and click Task Manager . If you see Roblox , click it, then click End task .

steps.title: Open the Control Panel.
steps.content: Open the Control Panel. Click the Start menu and type in "control panel". Click the Control Panel . [5] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source Use this method to uninstall Roblox using Windows 10 or Windows 11.

steps.title: Click Uninstall a program.
steps.content: Click Uninstall a program . This will be underneath the Programs header.

steps.title: Click Roblox.
steps.content: Click Roblox . If the list of applications isn't in alphabetical order, click the Name header to organize it.

steps.title: Click Uninstall.
steps.content: Click Uninstall . This will be above the list, next to Organize . You might see "Uninstall/Change". [6] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source A pop-up window will open. You can also right-click Roblox and click Uninstall .

steps.title: Click Yes.
steps.content: Click Yes . Roblox will begin uninstalling. You can also uninstall other programs in the list by right-clicking them, then Uninstall .

steps.title: Unlock your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Unlock your iPhone or iPad. If you use a passcode or Face ID, use it to unlock your device. Roblox is available for iOS in the App Store .

steps.title: Long-press the Roblox app.
steps.content: Long-press the Roblox app. You can find this on your home page or in your App Library . [7] X Research source The apps will begin to shake.

steps.title: Tap Remove app.
steps.content: Tap Remove app . If you're long-pressing the app from the App Library , you can directly select Delete app . [8] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Delete app.
steps.content: Tap Delete app . This will be in red.

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . Roblox will be removed from your device.

steps.title: Open the Google Play Store.
steps.content: Open the Google Play Store. This looks like a multi-colored "play" icon. [9] X Research source Similar to deleting other apps, you'll need to use the Google Play Store to uninstall Roblox.

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. This will be in the top-right corner. If you have multiple Google accounts connected, select the correct account from the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap Manage apps and devices.
steps.content: Tap Manage apps and devices . A new page will open. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Manage.
steps.content: Tap Manage . You'll see a list of installed apps. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Roblox.
steps.content: Tap Roblox . You may need to scroll to find this option.

steps.title: Tap the delete icon.
steps.content: Tap the delete icon. This will be in the top-right corner. Roblox will be uninstalled.

steps.title: Press the Xbox button on your controller.
steps.content: Press the Xbox button on your controller. If your console isn't turned on , do so now. A pop-up menu will open on the left.

steps.title: Select My games & apps.
steps.content: Select My games & apps . You can use the d-pad to navigate.

steps.title: Select Games.
steps.content: Select Games . This can be found on the left panel, above Apps . A new page will open with a list of your downloaded games.

steps.title: Highlight Roblox and press the "Menu" button.
steps.content: Highlight Roblox and press the "Menu" button. This button is to the lower right of the Xbox button on your controller.

steps.title: Select Uninstall.
steps.content: Select Uninstall . You can find this underneath Manage game & add-ons .

steps.title: Select Uninstall all.
steps.content: Select Uninstall all . This is the green button. Roblox will be deleted from your Xbox One.
